titles.title: Meeting the Inpatient Health Care Needs of Far South Texas Veterans Act of 2015

To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to ensure that the South Texas Veterans Affairs Health Care Center in Harlingen, Texas, includes a full-service Department of Veterans Affairs inpatient health care facility.
Meeting the Inpatient Health Care Needs of Far South Texas Veterans Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Meeting the Inpatient Health Care Needs of Far South Texas Veterans Act of 2015
Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA): (1) to ensure that the South Texas Veterans Affairs Health Care Center in Harlingen, Texas, includes a full-service VA inpatient health care facility; and (2) if needed, to modify the existing facility to meet this requirement.
